name: GoAchiev
tag_list: innovation-management, ideation, collaboration, prototyping, mockups, task-management
overview: GoAchiev is an easy to use software solution which lets teams to engage and drive innovation. GoAchiev provides a platform for your team to submit, vote and discuss ideas and in the process lets the best idea to be converted into a goal via a unique task management suite. GoAchiev also features an in-built prototype editor to help visualize your great ideas. With integrated social mechanics like leader-boards and badges, GoAchiev lets your team focus on work and have fun on the way.
